text: Dhanavanane apalya dhana (samarthya) nusara kharca kela pahije, ani jyaci jivika (roji) tyacyasathi kami keli geli asela tara allahane je kahi tyala de'una thevale ahe, tyatuna tyane (apalya samarthyanusara) dyave, konatyahi manasavara allaha ojhe thevata nahi, parantu itakeca jevadhe samarthya tyala dile gele ahe. Allaha garibinantara dhana dekhila pradana karela
